message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000, given its unique benefits.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product, which is a fair price considering its value to me. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is really my bottom line to make this work.  I'm confident you'll see a significant return on this investment.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me and my financial constraints.
